page.title: 19Routes To School
page.content: We did a survey on how children in the second and third classes at Dunston School get to school.19 walk,14 bike, 10 go in the car and 5 in the taxi. Dunston School does not only have children from Dunston in the second and third classes,it has 4 people from Wasps Nest,4 from Potterhamworth,2 from Nocton and 5 who live down Dunston Fen. An important aspect at Dunston School is learning cycling proficiency.This is a test for people nine and over to find out if they are safe to ride their bikes on the road. Most pupils leaving Dunston School go to Branston Comprehensive.The school bus arrives at Dunston at 8.30am and leaves at 8.40am,it brings the pupils back at 3.50pm.
